Package ss.pentago.tui

Class OnlineTextInputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.pentago.network.client.InputHandler
      • ss.pentago.tui.OfflineTextInputHandler
        • ss.pentago.tui.OnlineTextInputHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BotInputHandler
    public class OnlineTextInputHandler
extends OfflineTextInputHandler
    The OnlineTextInputHandler processes user input from System.in and tells the Client what to do with it. The OnlineTextInputHandler extends OfflineTextInputHandler by using a Protocol to send the user input to a server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected long opponentStartTime
      For autoMode or BotInputHandlers: After we make our move, record the time to determine how long the opponent is taking.
      protected ClientProtocolHandler protocol
      Keep track of the associated Client's ProtocolHandler to circumvent excessive casting.

      • parseCommand

        protected boolean parseCommand​(java.lang.String command)
        Parses the supplied command, and tells the Client what to do.
        Overrides:
        parseCommand in class OfflineTextInputHandler
        Parameters:
        command - the command
        Returns:
        false if the client needs to be stopped (due to messages not being sent in case of a closed connection), true otherwise

      • setUsername

        protected void setUsername​(java.lang.String username)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Check the username and try to send it to the Server to login.
        Parameters:
        username - the username (from input)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the Server closed the connection

      • run

        public void run()
        While running, obtain user commands from System.in and process them, telling the client what to do. On exit, call the associated Client's close().
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class OfflineTextInputHandler
